meta_title: What is Turned Around Time? A 2026 Industrial TAT Guide
meta_description: Turnaround time separates reactive plants from predictive ones. Learn how to calculate, optimize, and reduce TAT to maximize asset availability in 2026.
title: What is "Turned Around Time"? The Executive Guide to Industrial Turnaround Time (TAT) Optimization

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is "Turned Around Time"? The Executive Guide to Industrial Turnaround Time (TAT) Optimization

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern industrial facility during a planned maintenance turnaround. In the foreground, a diverse team of three maintenance professionals (two men, one woman) are standing near a large, partially disassembled centrifugal pump. They are wearing clean, professional PPE: white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility orange vests over blue work uniforms. One technician is holding a ruggedized industrial tablet (showing only the black back of the device), while the others are looking at the equipment. The background shows a clean, well-lit factory floor with other machinery, overhead cranes, and yellow safety railings. The lighting is bright and professional, suggesting a well-managed, high-tech environment. No text or logos are visible. Full-body shots of the professionals.
